revtext:
I have been to Wigomania, Seriously very very much impressed with staff and their products
Especially Rosy awesome 💕💕💕💕she apt for the job / best advisor  I have ever seen before
Products is really worth to take and wear
Luv to become a regular visitor and customer
All the very best.
revreply:
We are humbled by your review and appreciation.
It makes our mission and objective to bring a difference in the lives of ladies successful. 
We are indeed blessed to have a great team of individuals working for us who share our corporate motto and ensuring that each and every client that walks through our doors is given the best advice and recommendation.
